entities.name: headstones
entities.description: Headstones are mentioned as obstacles that Harry is dodging while running towards Cedric's body.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is the person whose body Harry is trying to reach. He is described as being on the ground and is the target of Voldemort's spell.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who is screaming for Harry to stun Cedric.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist of the story and is trying to reach Cedric's body. He is described as being in pain but focused on his goal.

entities.name: marble angel
entities.description: The marble angel is a location where Harry takes cover from the spells cast by the Death Eaters.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of people who are working with Voldemort and are trying to stop Harry. They are described as running at Harry with red light jets.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to reach Cedric's body, which is the target of Voldemort's spell.
Voldemort is casting a spell on Cedric's body.
Harry takes cover behind the marble angel from the spells cast by the Death Eaters.
Death Eaters are attacking Harry with red light jets.
